Articles.Content: On level 16, you find a gaming PC with the future KSP 1.0
You advance to level 17, in which you find a portal to the future where KSP-OS 9 is the most popular computer/mobile/tablet/hologram operating system in the world.
On level 18, you find a few crazy hobos and a completely empty floor. They run after you menacingly and will stay with you for the rest of your trip!

Upon arriving at level 19, you encounter a large gap in the floor. As you peer down into the rift, you realize that you\'re looking at the floor below, where the hobos joined you on your journey! One-way mirrors are quite the marvelous invention.

At your direction, the hobos fan out and begin searching the walls for hidden doors. One of them manages to find toe and hand holds on the smooth white wall, and climbs over to the other side to search there as well.

After a good half-hour of meticulous knocking, one of them finally discovers a loose panel in the wall. Do you go on, or head back?

Upon arriving at level 19, you encounter a large gap in the floor. As you peer down into the rift, you realize that you\'re looking at the floor below, where the hobos joined you on your journey! One-way mirrors are quite the marvelous invention.

At your direction, the hobos fan out and begin searching the walls for hidden doors. One of them manages to find toe and hand holds on the smooth white wall, and climbs over to the other side to search there as well.

After a good half-hour of meticulous knocking, one of them finally discovers a loose panel in the wall. Do you go on, or head back?

Go on.

You find a secret lab where the kerbal comics are created.

You meet skunky in person.

He then asks you to tell no one about the lab.
You then move on to the 20th floor, where Internet Forums LLC is based. There, forgetting your promise to Skunky, you give the location of the lab away to the internet world.
You then move on to the 21st floor, forgetting why, walking down to 1st floor, remembering why going back to the 21st, forgetting why...
You then move to the 22nd floor, where you are lectured about being able to go up or down only 1 floor at a time.

You move to the 23rd floor, which is oddly filled with sets of numbers with dates next to them.

You proceed to walk out, not noticing the large sign saying FUTURE LOTTERY NUMBERS above.

The 24th floor comes into view. You open the door to find a large SRB bell (about the size of a school bus in length, width, and height) and a countdown at 3 seconds. Do you:

A) Run screaming MOMMY! down the hall and up the stairs to the 25th floor

Jump into the SRB
B, oh yes.

The SRB is really poorly made and only makes it up an additional floor.

Your hair is now gone.

down one level (???)

You\'ll find purists.

Up to 25.

You find a 5 stars restaurant. After all the time going up and down, you can finally eat and drink

You go up 1 floor.

You find plans for the new KSP planets.

Then harv comes up after you and lectures you about not reading the Squad employees only sign on the wall near the stairs.

Go up one floor (27)

You found mincespy and his awesome machinery for creating forum games AND/or nukes.
Up, to 28. You find an elevator with wich you can go 2 stages up or down at a time.

You walk in the elevator go up a floor and it blows up...

You have now reached a launch place with a rocket in it.

You have to choices:

(A) Go into the rocket.

( walk away and pretend you saw nothing...

You go up again. You are now on level 30.

You find the tall skyscraper game.
You go up to 31 and discover tautology. Your hair then bursts into flames.
You go up to 31 and discover tautology. Your hair then bursts into flames.
dude really.

You go up to 32 and discover a gragon from Skyrim.

FUS RO DAH

You run up one more flight of stairs. (33)

Discover villagers from minecraft and an enderdragon with an enderman...

You go to 34 and you find a Fast-lift, but is never used

(A) you use the Fast-lift and take a risk that the lift CAN fall down to the ground.

( you use again the stairs.
